Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package flannel for versions less than 0.14.0-18
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package flannel for versions less than 0.14.0-18. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package flannel is earlier than 0.14.0-18, affected by CVE-2023-44487
